definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: A domain name is divided into three segments and separated by periods.
sentences.chinese: 一個域名名稱分三部分並由句點號分隔開。

sentences.english: Without the preceding slash, the period alone means any character.
sentences.chinese: 如果前面沒有反斜槓，單獨一個句點代表任意字符。

sentences.english: It also contains a lot of files and folders which are preceded by a full-stop.
sentences.chinese: 它也包含許多句點在前的文件和文件夾。

sentences.english: The most common of these characters is the period.
sentences.chinese: 這些最常用的句子結束字符是句點。

sentences.english: The Peach Blossom Fan story hasn't started yet, I will ring end.
sentences.chinese: 桃花扇裏的故事還沒開始，我便圈上了句點。

sentences.english: The sequence of the name spaces depends on the number of periods in the name.
sentences.chinese: 名字空間的序列取決於名字中句點的數量。

sentences.english: Double-click that method and type another period.
sentences.chinese: 雙擊該方法並鍵入另一個句點。

definition: to start sth new or original (idiom); to break a new path/to break fresh ground
legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
